privacy.title: Privacy Agreement
privacy.subtitle: Please carefully read the following privacy policy to understand how we collect and use your personal information
privacy.content:
Welcome to PomeloX application. We highly value your privacy rights. This privacy policy is designed to explain how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information.

## Information We Collect

To provide you with the best service experience, we need to collect the following personal information:

â€¢ **Identity Information**: Legal name and English nickname for identity verification and personalized services
â€¢ **Contact Information**: Email address and phone number for account verification, important notifications, and security alerts
â€¢ **Academic Information**: University affiliation for matching relevant activities and services
â€¢ **Basic Profile**: Gender and other basic information for personalized recommendations

## Purpose of Information Use

Your personal information will only be used for the following legitimate purposes:

â€¢ Create and manage your user account
â€¢ Provide activity registration and management services
â€¢ Send important service notifications and security alerts
â€¢ Improve our service quality and user experience
â€¢ Ensure platform security and prevent fraudulent activities

## Third-Party Services

To provide complete services, we may use the following third-party services:

â€¢ **Firebase Cloud Messaging**: For pushing important activity notifications
â€¢ **Aliyun**: For SMS verification code delivery services
â€¢ **Cloudflare**: For secure storage of user-uploaded images and files

These service providers all follow strict data protection standards, and we do not provide them with personal information beyond what is necessary for the service.
privacy.data_usage_highlight: Your legal name, phone number, and email are only used for identity verification and necessary notifications. We promise not to use this sensitive information for marketing purposes or share it with third parties.
privacy.data_protection:
## Data Protection Commitment

We use industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information:

â€¢ All data transmission uses HTTPS encryption
â€¢ Passwords are stored using secure hashing algorithms
â€¢ Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
â€¢ Strict access controls for internal personnel to personal information

## Your Rights

Under relevant laws and regulations, you have the following rights regarding your personal information:

â€¢ **Right to Access**: View the personal information we have collected about you at any time
â€¢ **Right to Rectification**: Correct inaccurate or outdated personal information
â€¢ **Right to Erasure**: Request deletion of your personal information and account
â€¢ **Right to Restrict Processing**: Limit how we process your information
â€¢ **Right to Data Portability**: Obtain a copy of your personal information

## Data Retention

â€¢ **Account Information**: Retained during your use of the service
â€¢ **Activity Records**: Retained for 2 years for service improvement
â€¢ **Communication Records**: Retained for 1 year for customer support
â€¢ **Deleted Data**: Permanently removed from all systems within 30 days

## Contact Us

For any privacy-related questions, please contact us through:

â€¢ Email: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
â€¢ Customer Support: Contact through in-app customer service

Continuing with registration indicates that you understand and agree to the above privacy policy terms.

### 6. Disclaimer

â€¢ Not liable for indirect losses caused by service use

To the maximum extent permitted by law, our liability shall not exceed your direct actual losses, with a total cap of $100.

### 7. Dispute Resolution

For disputes, we recommend resolution through:

We may modify these terms based on business development. Important changes will be notified 30 days in advance. Continued use indicates acceptance of new terms.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.full_content:
## Grapefruit-PomeloX Privacy Policy

**Effective Date:** August 15, 2025
**Version:** v1.0

### 1. Policy Overview

Welcome to Grapefruit-PomeloX! We deeply understand the importance of personal information protection and promise to strictly comply with relevant laws and regulations including the Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China.

### 2. Information Collection

**Information You Actively Provide:**
â€¢ Registration info: Legal name, English nickname, school, school email
â€¢ Contact info: Chinese or US phone number
â€¢ Identity verification: Referral code info, SMS verification code
â€¢ Activity-related: Activity registration info, personal preferences
â€¢ Volunteer service: Volunteer activity records, check-in times

**Automatically Collected Information:**
â€¢ Device info: Device model, OS version, app version
â€¢ Usage data: App usage statistics, feature click records
â€¢ Network info: IP address (only for technical support and security)
â€¢ Push info: Device push tokens (for notifications)

### 3. Information Use Purposes

We collect your personal information only for:
â€¢ Creating and managing your user account
â€¢ Processing activity registration and volunteer management
â€¢ Providing AI Q&A and study abroad guidance services
â€¢ Sending important service notifications and security alerts
â€¢ Analyzing user behavior to improve product features
â€¢ Preventing fraud and abuse, protecting user security

### 4. Third-Party Service Integration

To provide complete services, we integrate the following third-party services:
â€¢ **Gmail SMTP**: For sending verification emails and notifications
â€¢ **Cloudflare R2**: Securely store activity images and user avatars
â€¢ **Firebase FCM**: Send important notifications and activity reminders
â€¢ **Google OAuth**: Optional third-party login method

### 5. User Rights

According to laws and regulations, you have the following rights:
â€¢ **Right to Know**: Understand the types and purposes of personal information we collect
â€¢ **Access Right**: View personal information we have collected about you
â€¢ **Correction Right**: Correct inaccurate personal information
â€¢ **Deletion Right**: Request deletion of your personal information and account
â€¢ **Restriction Right**: Limit processing of certain personal information
â€¢ **Data Portability Right**: Obtain personal data in structured format

### 6. Minor Protection

â€¢ **Under 14**: Must obtain guardian consent
â€¢ **14-18 years**: Recommended use under guardian guidance
â€¢ **Over 18**: Can independently use all functions

We apply stricter security measures for minor information.

### 7. Data Security Measures

**Technical Security:**
â€¢ Use AES-256 encryption algorithm to protect sensitive data
â€¢ Full-site HTTPS encrypted transmission
â€¢ Strict permission management and identity verification
â€¢ 24/7 security monitoring and anomaly detection

**Management Security:**
â€¢ Employees can only access work-necessary data
â€¢ Record all data access and operations
â€¢ Regular security risk assessments

### 8. Data Storage

â€¢ **Storage Location**: Primarily stored on servers in China
â€¢ **Storage Period**: Only retained during necessary periods
â€¢ **Deletion Mechanism**: Automatic deletion or anonymization after expiration

### 9. Contact Us

For privacy-related questions, please contact:
â€¢ **Email**: info@americanpromotioncompany.com
â€¢ **Data Protection Officer**: dev@americanpromotioncompany.com
â€¢ **Service Hours**: Monday-Friday 9:00-18:00 (Beijing Time)

### 10. Policy Updates

We may modify this policy based on legal changes or business development. Important updates will be notified through in-app notifications, emails, etc.

---

**Thank you for your trust**

Protecting your privacy is our responsibility and the foundation of building trust with you. We welcome any suggestions or feedback.
